author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Metal profile tile tips…I’m using Schluter JOLLY to cap the last row of tile. I apply thin-set to the wall and embed the JOLLY. Mortar anchors it and the tiles. This color matches the shower valve trim which is oil rubbed bronze 🔥 #tileshower #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Metal Profile Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
